section.title: JEuclid Extensions to MathML
section.para: JEuclid Provides some extensions to MathML.

You can add additional attributes to the <math> element to specify JEuclid layout parameters. The attribute names are the same as given in the command line tool, prefixed with the http://jeuclid.sf.net/ns/context namespace. Example:
Check the command line tool for a list of possible parameters and their values.

Note: Rendering attributes given for the math attribute can not be overwritten by the external context. This means that if one of these attributes is set, it will always overwrite the settings in the MathViewer.

Note: Please note: In JEuclid versions 3.1.2 - 3.1.5 the attributes where named by the internal name, e.g. MATHSIZE instead of fontSize. The older attribute names are still supported, but should not be used, as they will be removed in a future version.
